txt.en: You have turned in a stack of trophies for a modest reward suitable for a collector such as yourself.
Wanted: Pure black fur from the beasts surrounding Gabilshathûr. Delivery of the items should be made to Avar at the dwarf-outpost.
'We can find many uses for the fur that you get from the beasts near our outpost.'
Thorin's Hall Task: Pure Black Fur
The dwarves at Gabilshathûr await a delivery of pure black fur to be made to Avar.
Deliver the pure black fur to Avar at Gabilshathûr in Angmar
You have accepted a task to collect and deliver pure black fur from the beasts surrounding Gabilshathûr to Avar at the dwarf-outpost.
Wanted: Pure black fur from the beasts surrounding Gabilshathûr.
